plot outline: The movie is about two friends who go to the same college: Ajith (Dileep) and Vijay (Kunchako Boban). They start out as enemies but end up friends. Vijay loves Geethu (Kavya Madhavan) without knowing Ajith is her brother, which he later finds out.
title: Dosth
plot: The film revolves around two college friends where one is a new student. The new student falls in love with his friend's sister without knowing she is his friend's sister. The plot forms when he realize the truth.

The movie is about two friends who go to the same college: Ajith (Dileep) and Vijay (Kunchako Boban). They start out as enemies but end up friends. Vijay loves Geethu (Kavya Madhavan) without knowing Ajith is her brother, which he later finds out.
